summary: The Interior Department's Bureau of Land Management oversees energy production on federal lands and collects royalties to help ensure a fair return for taxpayers. Oil and gas producers faced a sharp drop in demand during the COVID-19 pandemic. Price declines can increase financial risk for producers of recoverable oil and gas. Interior responded with a policy allowing temporary relief from royalties. We testified that Interior...
title: Federal Oil and Gas Revenue: Actions Needed to Improve BLM's Royalty Relief Policy
